items.content_html: A lightweight npm package to display the current Nepali date (Bikram Sambat) and English date in the Nepali language, including full details like hours, minutes, and seconds. Perfect for localization and applications requiring Nepali date-time formats. Created by: Janak
items.title: janaksanjel/nepali-date-time: A lightweight npm package to display the current Nepali date (Bikram Sambat) and English date in the Nepali language, including full details like hours, minutes, and seconds. Perfect for localization and applications requiring Nepali date-time formats.  Created by: Janak

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: investment is a lightweight library for financial calculations in Node.js. It currently supports functions like simple and compound interest calculations, making it ideal for developers who need quick and reliable financial tools.

items.content_html: The Simple React Pizza Ordering App is a lightweight web application that showcases various pizzas available for order. Built using React, this application demonstrates the use of conditional rendering and state management .

items.content_html: StickyNote is a lightweight web app for Twitch streamers to showcase live events like subscriptions and redemptions through customizable, draggable, and resizable sticky notes, enhancing audience interaction in real-time.

items.content_html: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
items.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
